Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins

Annotation Type PluginConfiguration

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({PARAMETER,FIELD}) @PluginVisitorStrategy(PluginConfigurationVisitor.class) public @interface PluginConfiguration
Identifies a parameter or field as a Configuration.
